checks.title: (Meta)data are assigned a persistent identifier
checks.description: This check verifies if the RO has a persintance identifier ['w3id.org', 'doi.org', 'purl.org', 'www.w3.org']
checks.explanation: The identifier (https://google.es) of the root data entity is not persistent. The identifier should be store in any of this [w3id.org, doi.org, purl.org, www.w3.org]

checks.title: Data are described with rich metadata
checks.description: This check verifies if the the following minimum metadata ['author', 'license', 'description'] are present in the ro-crate
checks.explanation: Missing the following metadata: license

checks.title: Metadata clearly and explicitly include the identifier of the data they describe
checks.description: This check verifies that the hasPart elements exists and are describe in the ro
explanation: This IRI could not be found: https://doi.org/10.1594/PANGAEA.908011/
#somef is described but has not been found locally

checks.title: (Meta)data are released with a clear and accessible data usage license
checks.description: This check verifies whether the RO has a licence. It also checks that there is a licence in RO parts
checks.explanation: These entities have no licence: ['https://w3id.org/example', 'https://doi.org/10.1594/PANGAEA.908011/', '#somef', 'index-en.html', 'ro-crate-metadata.json']

checks.title: (Meta)data are associated with detailed provenance
checks.description: This check verifies that all elements of the RO have the following fields: ['author', 'datePublished', 'citation']
explanation: https://w3id.org/example do not have author, datePublished, citation
https://doi.org/10.1594/PANGAEA.908011/ do not have author, datePublished, citation
#somef do not have author, datePublished, citation
index-en.html do not have author, datePublished, citation
ro-crate-metadata.json do not have author, datePublished, citation

checks.title: Content negotiation for RDF and HTML
checks.explanation: Ontology available in: HTML, RDF
checks.description: This check verifies of the ontology URI is published following the right content negotiation for RDF and HTML

checks.title: Persistent URL
checks.explanation: Ontology URI is persistent
checks.description: This check verifies if the ontology has a persistent URL (w3id, purl, DOI, or a W3C URL)

checks.title: Ontology URI is resolvable
checks.explanation: Ontology URL is resolvable in application/rdf+xml
checks.description: This check verifies if the ontology URI found within the ontology document is resolvable

checks.title: HTML availability
checks.explanation: Ontology available in HTML
checks.description: This check verifies if the ontology has an HTML documentation

checks.title: RDF Availability
checks.explanation: Ontology available in RDF
checks.description: This check verifies if the ontology has an RDF serialization (ttl, n3, rdf/xml, json-ld)

checks.title: Minimum metadata
checks.explanation: All the minimum metadata were found!
checks.description: This check verifies if the The following  minimum metadata [title, description, license, version iri, creator, creationDate, namespace URI] are present in the ontology

checks.title: Recommended metadata
checks.explanation: The following metadata was not found: contributor, citation
checks.description: This check verifies if the following recommended metadata [NS Prefix, version info, contributor, creation date, citation] are present in the ontology

checks.title: Optional metadata
checks.explanation: The following metadata was not found: doi, publisher, logo, status, modified, source, issued
checks.description: This check verifies if the following optional metadata [doi, previous version,publisher, logo, backwards compatibility, status, modified, source, issued date] are present in the ontology

checks.title: License availability
checks.explanation: A license was found http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/2.0/
checks.description: This check verifies if a license associated with the ontology

checks.title: License is resolvable
checks.explanation: License could be resolved
checks.description: This check verifies if the ontology license is resolvable

checks.title: Basic provenance metadata
checks.explanation: All basic provenance metadata found!Warning: We could not find the following optional provenance metadata: contributor. Please consider adding them if appropriate.
checks.description: This check verifies if basic provenance is available for the ontology: [author, creation date]

checks.title: Detailed provenance metadata
checks.explanation: The following provenance information was not found: issued, publisher. Warning: We could not find the following provenance metadata: contributor Please consider adding them (if appropriate).
checks.description: This check verifies if detailed provenance information is available for the ontology: [issued date, publisher]

checks.title: Ontology prefix
checks.explanation: Prefix declaration found in the ontology: exo
checks.description: This check verifies if an ontology prefix is available

checks.title: Prefix is in registry
checks.explanation: Prefix declaration found with correct namespace (in prefic.cc)
checks.description: This check verifies if the ontology prefix can be found in prefix.cc or LOV registries. This check also verifies if the prefix resolves to the same namespaceprefix found in the ontology.

checks.title: Ontology in metadata registry
checks.explanation: Ontology not found in a public registry
checks.description: This check verifies if the ontology can be found in a public registry (LOV)

checks.title: Metadata are accessible, even when ontology is not
checks.explanation: Ontology not found in a public registry
checks.description: Metadata are accessible even when the ontology is no longer available. Since the metadata is usually included in the ontology, this check verifies whether the ontology is registered in a public metadata registry (LOV)

checks.title: Open protocol
checks.explanation: The ontology uses an open protocol
checks.description: This check verifies if the ontology uses an open protocol (HTTP or HTTPS)

checks.title: Vocabulary reuse (metadata)
checks.explanation: Ontology reuses existing vocabularies for declaring metadata.
checks.description: This check verifies if the ontology reuses other vocabularies for declaring metadata terms

checks.title: Vocabulary reuse
checks.explanation: Could not find any imported/reused vocabularies
checks.description: This check verifies if the ontology imports/extends other vocabularies (besides RDF, OWL and RDFS)

checks.title: Documentation: labels
checks.explanation: Labels found for all ontology terms
checks.description: This check verifies the extent to which all ontology terms have labels (rdfs:label in OWL vocabularies, skos:prefLabel in SKOS vocabularies)

checks.title: Documentation: definitions
checks.explanation: Descriptions found for all ontology terms
checks.description: This check verifies whether all ontology terms have descriptions (rdfs:comment in OWL vocabularies, skos:definition in SKOS vocabularies)

checks.title: Version IRI
checks.explanation: Version IRI defined, IRI is different from ontology URI
checks.description: This check verifies if there is an id for this ontology version, and whether the id is unique (i.e., different from the ontology URI)

checks.title: Version IRI resolves
checks.explanation: Version IRI resolves
checks.description: This check verifies if the version IRI resolves

checks.title: Consistent ontology IDs
checks.explanation: Ontology URI is equal to ontology id
checks.description: This check verifies if the ontology URI is equal to the ontology ID

checks.title: Software is assigned a globally unique and persistent identifier
checks.description: This checks if there ir at least one DOI for this Software
checks.explanation: A Digital Object Identifier (DOI) is assigned to the Software

checks.title: Different versions of the same software must be assigned distinct identifiers
checks.description: This checks if every version has different and uniques identifiers
checks.explanation: Each version has a different identifier

checks.title: Software is described with rich metadata.
checks.description: This check verifies if the the following minimum metadata [title, description, license, installation instructions, requirements, creator, creationDate] are present
checks.explanation: The software contains the following metadata [title, description, license, installation instructions, requirements, creator, creationDate]

components.name: HTML representation of this data.
components.information: These checks have only been done by checking their metadata in the RO

checks.title: Data are described with rich metadata
checks.description: This check verifies if the the following minimum metadata ['author', 'license', 'description'] are present in the element
checks.explanation: Missing the following metadata: author, license, description

checks.title: (Meta)data are released with a clear and accessible data usage license
checks.description: This check verifies whether the element has a licence
checks.explanation: This element have no licence

checks.title: (Meta)data are associated with detailed provenance
checks.description: This check verifies that the element has the following fields: ['author', 'datePublished', 'citation']
checks.explanation: This element has no :author, datePublished, citation
